EmailTemplate.description: External: To new contact/user when created sharing community details
EmailTemplate.name: 9) New User Activation
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Activate Your Toolbank User Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Sent from: The {!User.Location__c} ToolBank
You have been invited to use the ToolBank on behalf of {!User.CompanyName}.
Click here {!Community_Url} to create a password and sign in to your account. Your username is {!Receiving_User.Username}
We look forward to serving you!
